channel.title: No-ip Not working correctly?
channel.description:
Okay well.
I've followed the Stickyfied tutorial in the tut section 100%. I've been hanging off every word.
I've set up my no-ip correctly and everything. but when i go to go onto my server via the Silabasoft Client it says that the server is down.
--
i've tried it on my laptop whilst the server running on my desktop computer i've tried it vise versa
I've tried it at a house without a router i've tried it at a house with a router (port forwarded, obvously)
--
Does anyone have any solutions on getting my server up?
PS. This is Global, For some reason my account was banned :\

item.title: No-ip Not working correctly?
item.dc:creator: @GlobalX GlobalX
item.description:
@GlobalX wrote:

no no. I Can get on perfectly, nobody else can.

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip Not working correctly?
item.dc:creator: @weaving8 weaving8
item.description:
@weaving8 wrote:

try this code

if (command.startsWith("ipban") && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
String banned = command.substring(6);
int name = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(banned);
client b = (client) server.playerHandler.players[name];
b.disconnected = true;
appendToIPBanned(b.connectedFrom);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+playerName+" has ip banned ["+b.connectedFrom+"] ("+command.substring(6)+")");
sendMessage("You have ip banned "+command.substring(6)+". Connected From: "+b.connectedFrom+"");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(""+command.substring(6)+" is either offline or name doesnt exist.");
}
BufferedWriter bw = null;
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));
bw.write(""+playerName+" IP Banned "+command.substring(6)+"");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage("Error ipbanning user.");
}
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip Not working correctly?

item.description:
@system wrote:

Hmm, I Don’t See Why It Isn’t Working, You 100% Sure Server Is Running? Have You Tried 0.0.0.0 To Logon To Server?

item.title: No-ip Not working correctly?
item.dc:creator: @I_can_3_hit I can 3 hit
item.description:
@I_can_3_hit wrote:

It should work either way but to log onto your own server you dont need a ip you can just leave it blank. If you still cant connect make sure the server is running.

Read full topic
